pynamics.kinematics.topology.Topology¶

class pynamics.kinematics.topology.Topology¶

Class representing a kinematic tree

__init__()¶

Create a Topology.

Methods

__init__()

Create a Topology.

add_connection(parent_body_name, ...)

Add a Body to this Topology by connecting it to an existing Body in the Topology, through a Joint.

add_frame(body_name, frame, frame_name)

Add a frame to a body in the Topology.

calculate_body_accelerations(q_dd)

Calculate the accelerations of each body given the joint accelerations.

calculate_body_velocities()

Calculate the velocity of each body based on the joint velocities of the joints in the Topology.

dictionarify(vector)

get_X(from_body_name, from_frame_name, ...)

Get the X matrix to transform spatial velocities.

get_Xstar(from_body_name, from_frame_name, ...)

Get the X* matrix to transform spatial force vectors.

get_joint_space_positions()

get_joint_space_velocities()

get_mass_matrix()

Compute the joint-space mass matrix of the topology.

get_ordered_body_list()

Get the topologically-ordered list of bodies in the Topology.

get_transform(from_body_name, ...)

Get the affine 4x4 transform between frames in this Topology.

matrixify(dictionary)

update_body_accelerations()

update_body_velocities()

Update the body velocities based on the joint velocities.

vectorify_position(dictionary)

vectorify_velocity(dictionary)
